LIGHTSUM

Introduction

Sangah is a South Korean singer, dancer, and rapper under Cube Entertainment. She debuted on June 10, 2021, as a member of the girl group LIGHTSUM.

In 2023, Sangah was a constant of the Mnet's survival show "Queendom Puzzle", where she was eliminated after ranking 22nd at episode 7.

Sangah took dance classes at PinkM Dance Academy and A-Root Dance Academy.
